$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd.title: $:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd
$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd.text:
\whitespace trim \define folded-state() $:/state/folded/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define cancel-delete-tiddler-actions(message) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-$message$-tiddler"/> \import [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Macro/View]!has[draft.of]] <$vars storyTiddler=<> tiddlerInfoState=<>>
> data-tags={{!!tags}} class={{{ tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-view-frame [is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-exists]] [is[missing]!is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-missing]] [is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-shadow]] [is[shadow]is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-overridden-shadow]] [is[system]then[tc-tiddler-system]] [{!!class}] [tags[]encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-tagged-]] +[join[ ]] }}}> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]!has[draft.of]] +[remove[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/images/pie.title: $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/images/pie
$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/images/pie.text:
<$set name="PI" value="3.14">
  <$set name="circumference" value={{{ [<PI>multiply[2]multiply[5]] }}}>
    <$set name="all" value={{{ [<td-baseName>addprefix[$:/todolist/data/status/]is[tiddler]indexes[]count[]] }}}>
      <$set name="closed" value={{{ [<td-baseName>addprefix[$:/todolist/data/done/]is[tiddler]indexes[]count[]] }}}>
  <$set name="ratio" value={{{ [<all>is[0]then<circumference>else<circumference>multiply<closed>divide<all>] }}}>
        <svg
          class="py-icon py-pie"
          height="1em"
          width="1em"
          viewBox="0 0 30 30">

          <circle
            class="border"
            r="14"
            cx="15"
            cy="15"
            fill="white"
            stroke="tomato"
            stroke-width="2"/>

          <circle
            class="border"
            r="5"
            cx="15"
            cy="15"
            fill="transparent"
            stroke="tomato"
            stroke-width="10"
            transform="rotate(-90) translate(-30)"
            stroke-dasharray={{{ [<ratio>addsuffix[ 31.42]] }}}/>

        </svg>
  </$set>
      </$set>
    </$set>
  </$set>
</$set>

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/macros/todolist-ui.title: $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/macros/todolist-ui
$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/macros/todolist-ui.text:
\define td-basePath() $:/todolist/data \define gtd-add-task-action() <$list filter="[{$:/state/gtd/edit}is[tiddler]!tag[Todolist]]"> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/state/gtd/edit}} $tags="Todolist"/> <$list filter="[getindex[itemtext]!is[blank]]" variable=ignore> <$set name=item value=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex[itemtext]] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="undone" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="none" /> <$macrocall $name="todolist-add-item-to-list" targetTiddler=<> item=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="itemtext" $value=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="markall" $value=""/> \end \define gtd-todolist-ui(caption:"A plain todolist", width:"100%") \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Todolist/Macro]!has[draft.of]] \whitespace trim <$vars nameSpace= """$(td-baseName)$""" stateTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/state/$(td-baseName)$""" taskTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/tasks/$(td-baseName)$""" doneTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/done/$(td-baseName)$""" statusTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/status/$(td-baseName)$""" priorityTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/priority/$(td-baseName)$""" archiveTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/archive/$(td-baseName)$""" displayArchivedTiddler="""Todolist - Archived Items - $(td-baseName)$""" >

$caption$

<$vars todolist-add-task-action=<>><>
<>
<>
<>
<> <$list filter="[getindex[editview]match[edit]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$macrocall $name="draggable-list" targetTiddler=<> />"""> <> <$list filter="[indexes[]!nsort[]]" variable="item"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done-task" field="text" />
\end

$:/plugins/xp/aggregation-gtd/readme.title: $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-gtd/readme
$:/plugins/xp/aggregation-gtd/readme.text:
! Getting Things Done

A task management tool that integrates $:/plugins/nico/projectify + $:/plugins/kookma/todolist + $:/plugins/xp/aggregation

! ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—

è¯¥æ’ä»¶ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

* åœ¨ä¸»ç•Œé¢ GettingThingsDone ä¸­ç®¡ç†ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚
* åœ¨è¾¹æ  [[Things|$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Things]] ä¸­æŸ¥çœ‹ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚
* é¡µé¢å·¥å…·æ æŒ‰é’® {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/Scheduled}} æŸ¥çœ‹ä»Šå¤©å¾…åŠçš„ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚

GTD ä»»åŠ¡æ¡ç›®ä¸ä¼šä¸åŸæœ‰ç»´åŸºå†…å®¹ç›¸å†²çªï¼Œä»»åŠ¡åä½¿ç”¨ `caption` å­—æ®µï¼Œè€Œ `title` ä½¿ç”¨ `$:/gtd/<timestamp>` è‡ªåŠ¨å‘½åã€‚

!! å››è±¡é™

* åœ¨è±¡é™åº•éƒ¨çš„è¾“å…¥æ¡†ä¸­åˆ›å»ºæ–°ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚
* æ‹–æ‹½ä»»åŠ¡æ¡ç›®çš„é“¾æ¥åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªè±¡é™ï¼Œå¿«é€Ÿæ”¹å˜è±¡é™ã€‚
* ç‚¹å‡»è±¡é™æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¯¥è±¡é™çš„å…¨éƒ¨åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚

ç¼–è¾‘ä»»åŠ¡æ¡ç›®ï¼š

* ç‚¹å‡» <<.icon $:/xp/images/edit>> ç¼–è¾‘æŒ‰é’®æ‰“å¼€å¼¹çª—ç¼–è¾‘è§†å›¾ã€‚
** ç¼–è¾‘å†…å®¹æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¿«æ·é”®æ ¼å¼åŒ–å†…å®¹ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ <kbd>ctrl-1</kbd> ä¸€çº§æ ‡é¢˜ã€<kbd>ctrl-shift-L</kbd> é¡¹ç›®åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚ï¼ˆç¼–è¾‘å·¥å…·æ è¢«éšè—äº†ï¼‰
* ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ‰“å¼€é“¾æ¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ TiddlyWiki é»˜è®¤çš„ç¼–è¾‘è§†å›¾ã€‚ä¸è¿‡ï¼Œå¼¹çª—ç¼–è¾‘æ›´é«˜æ•ˆï¼

!! æœç´¢

è¯¥é¡µé¢æä¾›æœç´¢ã€è¿‡æ»¤ã€æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

åœ¨è¿‡æ»¤é¢æ¿ï¼Œå½“ä»¥æ—¶é—´ä¸ºæ¡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œè¿‡æ»¤æ—¶ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥è¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¥æœŸï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ `2022` `202206` `20220601`ã€‚

!! æ¸…ç†æœº

> åŸæœ¬è¯¥é¡µé¢è¦åšæˆã€Œå³å°†åˆ°æ¥ã€çš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¾¹æ ä¸­å«æœ‰è¯¥åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¸”æ–¹ä¾¿éšæ—¶æŸ¥çœ‹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸»ç•Œé¢ä¸åšé‡å¤çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

è¯¥æŒ‰é’®å¯æ¸…ç†æ®‹ç•™çš„ todolist æ•°æ®ã€‚å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨æŸ¥çœ‹å·¥å…·æ ä¸­çš„åˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’®åˆ é™¤æ¡ç›®æ—¶ï¼Œè¯¥ä»»åŠ¡çš„ todolist æ•°æ®å¹¶æœªåˆ é™¤ã€‚

é™„åŠ åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šå¦‚æœåœ¨ä¸»ç•Œé¢æ·»åŠ äº†ä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯çš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå°†å®ƒæ‹–åŠ¨åˆ°ã€Œæ¸…ç†æœºã€å³å¯åˆ é™¤ã€‚

!! è¾¹æ é€‰é¡¹å¡ Things

å¿«æ·é”® <kbd>alt-T</kbd>ã€‚é»˜è®¤åªæ˜¾ç¤ºæœªå®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»è±¡é™æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¯¥è±¡é™çš„å…¨éƒ¨åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚

ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼šã€Œå³å°†åˆ°æ¥ã€æœ€å¤šåªæ˜¾ç¤º 5 æ¡å¾…åŠä»»åŠ¡ã€‚ç‚¹å‡»æ ‡é¢˜æŸ¥çœ‹å…¨éƒ¨åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚

<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<>> <$edit-text class="xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input" tiddler=<> field="todo-name" />

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/EditTemplate.text:
\define save-tiddler-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name={{{ [get[text]] }}} $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> \end \define config-visibility-title() $:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define importFileActions() <$action-popup $state=<> $coords="(0,0,0,0)" $floating="yes"/> \end <$set name="currentItem" value={{$:/state/gtd/edit}}> <$set name="td-baseName" value={{{ [removeprefix[$:/]] }}}>
> data-tags={{!!tags}} class="tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-edit-frame tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-system xp-gtd-editor"> <$fieldmangler> <$vars storyTiddler=<>> <$keyboard key="((save-tiddler))" actions=<> tag="div"> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/gtd/edit-caption" tag="input" class="tc-titlebar tc-edit-texteditor" focus="yes" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} cancelPopups="yes"/>
<$set name="edit-preview-state" value={{{ [{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}!match[yes]then[$:/state/showeditpreview]] :else[] }}}> <$vars importTitle=<> importState=<> > <$dropzone importTitle=<> autoOpenOnImport="no" contentTypesFilter={{$:/config/Editor/ImportContentTypesFilter}} class="tc-dropzone-editor" enable={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} filesOnly="yes" actions=<> ><$reveal stateTitle=<> type="match" text="yes" tag="div"> <$tiddler tiddler=<>>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/>
<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/editpreviewtype}} mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/preview/output" mode="inline"/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<> type="nomatch" text="yes" tag="div"> <$edit tiddler=<> field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus={{{ [{$:/config/AutoFocus}match[text]then[true]] ~[[false]] }}} cancelPopups="yes" fileDrop={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} ><$set name="targetTiddler" value=<> ><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" ><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" ><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" ><$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" ><$transclude/>
<>

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/EditTemplate.footer: Status: <$list filter="[!tag[done]]">undone <$list filter="[removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/todolist/data/status/]search:text[undone]]"> <$list filter="[!tag[done]]"> / todolist <$list filter="[tag[done]]"> <$list filter="[removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/todolist/data/status/]!search:text[undone]]"> completed <$button tooltip="Delete all information about this item" class="py-btn"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/todolist/data]suffix]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/>   <$button tooltip="Confirm changes to this item. ctrl-Enter" class="py-btn"> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$list filter="[get[caption]!match{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/FilterButtons/d.title: $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/FilterButtons/delete
$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/FilterButtons/d.text:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
<$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete these tiddlers?">
    <$list filter=<<searchFilter>>>
  <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<<currentTiddler>>/>
    <$vars td-baseName={{{ [<currentTiddler>removeprefix[$:/]] }}} td-basePath="$:/todolist/data">
  <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix<td-basePath>suffix<td-baseName>]"/>
    </$vars>
    <$list filter="$:/q1 $:/q2 $:/q3 $:/q4" variable="qList">
  <$action-listops $tiddler=<<qList>> $subfilter="-[<currentTiddler>]"/>
    </$list>
  <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>/>
    </$list>
</$action-confirm>
{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
</$button>

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/ManagerView/Tod.title: $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/ManagerView/TodoDueDate
$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/ManagerView/Tod.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/

<$list filter=<<py-is-overdue>>>
    <$list
      filter=<<py-is-due-yesterday>>
      emptyMessage="""<$view field="due" format="relativedate"/>"""
    >
<<lingo Yesterday>>
    </$list>
</$list>
<$list filter=<<py-is-not-overdue>>>
  <$list filter=<<py-is-due-today>>>
    <<lingo Today>>
  </$list>
  <$list filter=<<py-is-due-later>>>
<$list
  filter=<<py-is-due-tomorrow>>
  emptyMessage="""<$view field="due" format="date" template={{$:/language/xp/aggregation-gtd/DateFormat}}/>"""
>
  <<lingo Tomorrow>>
</$list>
  </$list>
</$list>

<$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> class="py-input input-larger" type="search" tag="input" filterMinLength="1" focus={{$:/config/xp/aggregation/SearchAutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="yes"/> {{$:/xp/images/filter}} <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]has[text]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-aggregation-gtd input"""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <> <$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} quadrantRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} doneRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} textRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} todolistRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} scheduleRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} timeRun={{{ [get[filter]] }}} fieldRun={{{ [has[filter]get[filter]] }}} valueRun={{{ [has[filter]get[filter]] }}} limitRun=" +[limit[100]]" resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>"> <$set name="searchFilter" value={{{ [addsuffix[ ]addsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffix] }}}> {{$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/FilterButtons/delete}} <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]get[text]trim[]!is[blank]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="yes" animate="yes"> <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="yes" animate="yes">

$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/TodolistButton.text: \whitespace trim \define save-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end <$list filter="[all[current]tag[GTD]!tag[Todolist]!has[draft.of]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="py-btn" tooltip="æ·»åŠ å¾…åŠåˆ—è¡¨" aria-label="add todolist" > <$action-listops $tags="Todolist"/> <> {{$:/core/images/list-bullet}} <$list filter="[all[current]tag[GTD]tag[Todolist]!has[draft.of]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="py-btn py-pie" tooltip="éšè—å¾…åŠåˆ—è¡¨" aria-label="hide todolist" > <$action-listops $tags="-Todolist"/> {{$:/core/images/list-bullet}}

$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-actions.title: $:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-actions
$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-actions.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/ \define gtdDeleteActions() <$vars td-baseName={{{ [removeprefix[$:/]] }}} td-basePath="$:/todolist/data"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefixsuffix]"/> <$list filter="$:/q1 $:/q2 $:/q3 $:/q4" variable="qList"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="-[]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> \end <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list filter="[all[current]tag[GTD]!has[draft.of]]" variable="ignore">

$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-todolist.title: $:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-todolist
$:/xp/ui/ViewTemplate/gtd-todolist.text:
<$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<folded-state>> text="hide" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]tag[GTD]tag[Todolist]!has[draft.of]]" variable="ignore">

<$vars td-baseName={{{ [<currentTiddler>removeprefix[$:/]] }}}>

<<gtd-todolist-ui caption:"Todolist {{||$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/images/pie}}">>

</$vars>

</$list></$reveal>
